title: Social Media Content Templates Library

linkedin.strategy: Mix of industry-specific and broader business hashtags

twitter.strategy: Use trending hashtags when relevant, create branded hashtags

instagram.strategy: Mix of popular, moderately popular, and niche hashtags

facebook.strategy: Focus on community and location-based hashtags

engagement_best_practices: Respond to comments within 2-4 hours during business hours
Use platform-specific features (polls, stories, live videos)
Cross-promote content across platforms with platform-specific adaptations
Monitor brand mentions and engage with user-generated content
Share behind-the-scenes content to humanize your brand
Collaborate with industry influencers and thought leaders
Use analytics to optimize posting times and content types
